category: Things that can be 'broken' non-physically or figuratively
explanation: Heart (emotionally), Code (deciphered), Wave (natural phenomenon), and Silence (interrupted) can all be 'broken' without physical destruction of a solid object. A 'Bone' is physically broken, indicating structural damage to its material form.

The first four items (Papermaking, Printing, Gunpowder, and Compass) are traditionally recognized as the Four Great Inventions of Ancient China. The Steam Engine, while also a landmark invention, originated in the Western Industrial Revolution much later.
Meter, Inch, Foot, and Yard are all standard units of measurement for length or distance. Kilogram is a unit for measuring mass.
